GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.35 to before v5.4.231
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: f_fs: Prevent race during ffs_ep0_queue_wait

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.231 by commit a8d40942df074f4ebcb9bd3413596d92f323b064, it was introduced in version v2.6.35 by commit ddf8abd2599491cbad959c700b90ba72a5dce8d0. For more details please see the references link.
